bug.short_desc: Problem occurred - neither one of {0} paths exists
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
$ sudo tracer -ea Problem occurred - neither one of {0} paths exists Please contact maintainer of tracer package in your distribution.
$ sudo dnf install tracer-common ...
$ sudo tracer -ea You should restart: ...
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): python2-tracer-0.6.12-1.fc25.noarch python3-tracer-0.6.12-1.fc25.noarch tracer-common-0.6.12-1.fc25.noarch
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. install python3-tracer, but not tracer-common
